					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[WordPress子比主题模板美化教程]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/405.html</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 08 Jul 2021 07:00:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=405</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>前言</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>本页主题美化内容是觅知社长在建站时一个一个测试过无任何错误的记录合集，使用之前先参考本站，若觉得实用就拿去用吧，我会持续的更新。</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>美化说明：</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>每个人的审美观念不一样，所以请先参考本站或测试在用。</li><li>主题美化、小工具可能会有一定程度使网站加载缓慢、CSS全局污染等等一系列的问题，请一定要测试后在进行美化。</li><li>主题美化可能会对主题文件进行修改，更新时请及时备份主题美化的文件，或者收藏本站，以免一些主题页面或美化效果丢失。</li><li>子比主题美化都是社长自己鼓捣、测试后才分布的，完全免费，开放。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><span class="has-inline-color has-vivid-red-color">说明：（重要）</span></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:list {"style":{"color":{"text":"#fb0000"}}} -->
<ul class="has-text-color" style="color:#fb0000"><li><strong>↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓不会添加代码的看下面↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>（<strong><qc style="color:rgba(255,0,0,1);background:undefined">最新版子比主题</qc></strong>）CSS代码添加到后台：<strong><qc style="color:rgba(255,0,0,1);background:undefined">子比主题设置—&gt;自定义代码—&gt;自定义CSS样式</qc></strong></li><li>（<qc style="color:rgba(255,0,0,1);background:undefined"><strong>最新版子比主题</strong></qc>）JS即javascript代码添加到：<strong><qc style="color:rgba(255,0,0,1);background:undefined">后台子比主题设置—&gt;自定义代码—&gt;自定义javascript代码</qc></strong></li><li>（<strong><qc style="color:rgba(255,0,0,1);background:undefined">最新版子比主题</qc></strong>）没有特殊说明的小工具，<strong><qc style="color:rgba(255,0,0,1);background:undefined">自定义HTML小工具：添加网站后台—&gt;外观–&gt;小工具–&gt;点击【自定义HTML】选择放置的位置—&gt;把代码复制进去，保存即可。</qc></strong></li><li><strong><qc style="color:rgba(255,0,0,1);background:undefined">↑↑↑↑↑↑不会添加代码的看上面↑↑↑↑↑↑</qc></strong></li><li>其他添加方式的，我会在教程里告知，若只需添加CSS+JS的教程，我可能不重复告知了，请注意看上面的方法。</li><li>有些美化教程本站已经发布的，本文章将不再进行编写教程，直接跳转到文章页面。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_11212" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined"><strong>1、网</strong>站左上角添加FPS帧率显示</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_11212"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>使用方法</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>你只需在<strong>网站管理后台---》主题设置---》自定义代码---》自定义javascript代码</strong>，把下面的js代码复制粘贴到里面即可。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">自定义javascript代码：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">// FPS帧开始
// by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn
$('body').before('&lt;div id="fps" style="z-index:10000;position:fixed;top:3;left:3;font-weight:bold;">&lt;/div>');
var showFPS = (function(){ 
    var requestAnimationFrame =  
        window.requestAnimationFrame || 
        window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame || 
        window.mozRequestAnimationFrame ||
        window.oRequestAnimationFrame ||
        window.msRequestAnimationFrame || 
        function(callback) { 
            window.setTimeout(callback, 1000/60); 
        }; 
    var e,pe,pid,fps,last,offset,step,appendFps; 
 
    fps = 0; 
    last = Date.now(); 
    step = function(){ 
        offset = Date.now() - last; 
        fps += 1; 
        if( offset >= 1000 ){ 
        last += offset; 
        appendFps(fps); 
        fps = 0; 
        } 
        requestAnimationFrame( step ); 
    }; 
    appendFps = function(fps){ 
        console.log(fps+'FPS');
        $('#fps').html(fps+'FPS');
    };
    step();
})();
// by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn
// FPS帧结束
</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>效果图</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":416,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/image-1.png" alt="" class="wp-image-416"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_19776" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">2、zibll子比主题文章标签美化</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_19776"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>使用方法</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>复制CSS代码到后台子比主题设置---》自定义CSS样式---》将CSS代码粘贴框里，即可大功告成。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">自定义CSS代码：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*文章随机彩色标签开始*/
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
.article-tags{margin-bottom: 10px}.article-tags a{padding: 4px 10px;background-color: #19B5FE;color: white;font-size: 12px;line-height: 16px;font-weight: 400;margin: 0 5px 5px 0;border-radius: 2px;display: inline-block}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n){background-color: #4A4A4A;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n+1){background-color: #ff5e5c;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n+2){background-color: #ffbb50;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n+3){background-color: #1ac756;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:nth-child(5n+4){background-color: #19B5FE;color: #FFF}.article-tags a:hover{background-color: #1B1B1B;color: #FFF}
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
/*文章随机彩色标签结束*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17530" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">3、网站添加侧边彩色滚动条</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17530"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:heading -->
<h2><strong>使用方法</strong></h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>一般主题都会自带 自定义代码 这样主题设置的，只需在主题设置自定义CSS代码里面添加美化的css代码就即可美化啦！<br>如果主题没有 自定义代码 那么在WordPress主题目录文件里找style.css文件或者在WordPress后台里找“外观---&gt;自定义---&gt;额外CSS”里面美化的css代码就即可美！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">彩色滚动条代码CSS：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter {"c_language":"css"} -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="css" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/**彩色滚动条样式开始*/
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 10px;  
  height: 1px;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background-color: #12b7f5;
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(255, 93, 143, 1) 25%, transparent 25%, transparent 50%, rgba(255, 93, 143, 1) 50%, rgba(255, 93, 143, 1) 75%, transparent 75%, transparent);
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    background: #f6f6f6;
}
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
/**彩色滚动条样式结束*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18933" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">4、主题LOGO扫光</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18933"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">CSS代码：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/* logo扫光开始 */
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
.navbar-brand{position:relative;overflow:hidden;margin: 0px 0 0 0px;}.navbar-brand:before{content:""; position: absolute; left: -665px; top: -460px; width: 200px; height: 15px; background-color: rgba(255,255,255,.5); -webkit-transform: rotate(-45deg); -moz-transform: rotate(-45deg); -ms-transform: rotate(-45deg); -o-transform: rotate(-45deg); transform: rotate(-45deg); -webkit-animation: searchLights 6s ease-in 0s infinite; -o-animation: searchLights 6s ease-in 0s infinite; animation: searchLights 6s ease-in 0s infinite;}@-moz-keyframes searchLights{50%{left: -100px; top: 0;} 65%{left: 120px; top: 100px;}}@keyframes searchLights{40%{left: -100px; top: 0;} 60%{left: 120px; top: 100px;} 80%{left: -100px; top: 0px;}}
/* by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
/* logo扫光结束 */</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_19074" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">5、导航栏标题字体加粗</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_19074"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">添加到自定CSS代码：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*导航栏字体加粗开始*/
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
ul.nav {font-weight: 700;}
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
/*导航栏字体加粗结束*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_16264" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">6、用户头像呼吸光环+鼠标悬停旋转放大</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_16264"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">自定义CSS代码：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*头像呼吸光环和鼠标悬停旋转放大开始*/
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
.avatar{border-radius: 50%; animation: light 4s ease-in-out infinite; transition: 0.5s;}.avatar:hover{transform: scale(1.15) rotate(720deg);}@keyframes light{0%{box-shadow: 0 0 4px #f00;} 25%{box-shadow: 0 0 16px #0f0;} 50%{box-shadow: 0 0 4px #00f;} 75%{box-shadow: 0 0 16px #0f0;} 100%{box-shadow: 0 0 4px #f00;}}
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
/*头像呼吸光环和鼠标悬停旋转放大结束*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_13166" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">7、首页文章列表悬停上浮开始</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_13166"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">自定义CSS代码：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*首页文章列表悬停上浮开始*/
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
@media screen and (min-width: 980px){.tab-content .posts-item:not(article){transition: all 0.3s;}.tab-content .posts-item:not(article):hover{transform: translateY(-10px); box-shadow: 0 8px 10px rgba(255, 112, 173, 0.35);}}
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
/*首页文章列表悬停上浮结束*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --></div></div></div></div>

<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_11988" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">10、首页左侧边栏添加【联系站长】按钮</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_11988"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:zibllblock/postsbox -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_14350" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">11、文章底部添加最后更新时间或过期失效提示</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_14350"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>分为三个步骤</strong></li><li><strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">1.将下面的PHP代码加入到主题目录下：themes/zibll/functions.php文件中。</qc></strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//文章过期提示开始
function article_time_update() {
    date_default_timezone_set('PRC');
    $newdate=time();
    $updated_date = get_the_modified_time('Y-m-d H:i:s');
    $updatetime=strtotime($updated_date);
    $custom_content = '';
    if ( $newdate > $updatetime+86400) {
    $custom_content= '&lt;div class="article-timeout">&lt;strong>&lt;i class="fa fa-bell" aria-hidden="true">&lt;/i> 温馨提示：&lt;/strong>本文最后更新于&lt;code>'. $updated_date . '&lt;/code>，某些文章具有时效性，若有错误或已失效，请在下方&lt;a href="#comment">留言&lt;/a>或联系&lt;a target="_blank" title="觅知博客" href="http://wpa.qq.com/msgrd?v=3&amp;uin=1426239465&amp;site=qq&amp;menu=yes">&lt;b>觅知社长&lt;/b>&lt;/a>。&lt;/div >';
    }
        echo $custom_content;
    }
//文章过期提示结束</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>说明：</strong>请自己修改上面有关于自己网站的信息，改成自己网站信息即可，图标可以用阿里矢量图。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined"><strong>2</strong>.<strong>在主题目录<strong>themes</strong></strong>/<strong>zibll/inc/functions/zib-single.php文件中，文章分页函数（我的是在322行，因为我的代码有改动，所有不确定行数，见下图）下面添加下方代码即可。</strong></qc></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17013" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">13、网站添加添加复制透明提示框</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17013"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>1.子比主题设置---&gt;自定义代码---&gt;自定义<qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">javascript</qc>代码：,添加以下代码：</strong></p>

<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//透明复制提示
// by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn
document.body.oncopy = function() {layer.msg('&lt;p style="font-weight: 700;">【觅知博客(WWW.98DOU.CN)】&lt;br>复制成功，若要转载请务必保留原文链接！&lt;/p>', function(){});};
</code></pre>

<p><strong>2.子比主题设置---&gt;自定义代码---&gt;自定义底部<qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">HTML</qc>代码,添加以下代码：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>效果演示：</strong></li></ul>

<!-- wp:image {"align":"center","sizeSlug":"large"} -->

<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_13826" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">14、修改主题字体（网站字体美化）</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_13826"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:zibllblock/postsbox -->
<div data-pid="579" class="wp-block-zibllblock-postsbox">[postsbox post_id="579"]</div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/postsbox --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17271" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">15、子比主题外链修改go外链跳转页面</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17271"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>在主题目录下<strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">go.php</qc></strong>文件里面的全部代码清空，然后把下面的代码复制进去即可。替换原来的即可。</li><li>更新主题和<strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">修改</qc></strong>前记得备份<strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">go.php</qc></strong>。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>注意：</strong>修改代码内的第108行的logo地址，本教程适用于子比主题最新版，其他主题请自行测试。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn-->
&lt;?php
if (
    strlen($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']) > 384 ||
    strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "eval(") ||
    strpos($_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], "base64")
) {
    @header("HTTP/1.1 414 Request-URI Too Long");
    @header("Status: 414 Request-URI Too Long");
    @header("Connection: Close");
    @exit;
}
//通过QUERY_STRING取得完整的传入数据，然后取得url=之后的所有值，兼容性更好

@session_start();
$t_url = !empty($_SESSION['GOLINK']) ? $_SESSION['GOLINK'] : preg_replace('/^url=(.*)$/i', '$1', $_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]);
//数据处理
if (!empty($t_url)) {
    //判断取值是否加密
    if ($t_url == base64_encode(base64_decode($t_url))) {
        $t_url =  base64_decode($t_url);
    }
    //防止xss
    $t_url =  htmlspecialchars($t_url);

    //对取值进行网址校验和判断
    preg_match('/^(http|https|thunder|qqdl|ed2k|Flashget|qbrowser):\/\//i', $t_url, $matches);
    if ($matches) {
        $url = $t_url;
        $title = '页面加载中,请稍候...';
    } else {
        preg_match('/\./i', $t_url, $matche);
        if ($matche) {
            $url = 'http://' . $t_url;
            $title = '页面加载中,请稍候...';
        } else {
            $url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
            $title = '参数错误，正在返回首页...';
        }
    }
} else {
    $title = '参数缺失，正在返回首页...';
    $url = 'http://' . $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'];
}
?>

&lt;html>
&lt;head>
    &lt;meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
    &lt;meta name="robots" content="noindex, nofollow" />
    &lt;title>&lt;?php echo $title; ?>&lt;/title>
    &lt;meta name="keywords" content="">
    &lt;meta name="description" content="">
    &lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, maximum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no, viewport-fit=cover" />
  &lt;meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-transform" />
  &lt;meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-siteapp" />
  &lt;meta name="renderer" content="webkit"/>
  &lt;meta name="force-rendering" content="webkit"/>
  &lt;meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=Edge,chrome=1"/>
    &lt;link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/ico" href="/favicon.ico">
    &lt;script>
  function link_jump()
  {
    //禁止其他网站使用我们的跳转页面
    var MyHOST = new RegExp("&lt;?php echo $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']; ?>");
    if (!MyHOST.test(document.referrer)) {
       location.href="https://" + MyHOST;
    }
    location.href="&lt;?php echo $url; ?>";
  }
    //延时1S跳转，可自行修改延时时间
  //setTimeout(link_jump, 1500);
  //延时50S关闭跳转页面，用于文件下载后不会关闭跳转页的问题
  setTimeout(function(){window.opener=null;window.close();}, 50000);
  &lt;/script>
&lt;style>
      *,:after,:before{box-sizing:border-box}body.reader-black-font,body.reader-black-font .history-mode .view-area,body.reader-black-font .history-mode .view-area pre,body.reader-black-font .main .kalamu-area,body.reader-black-font .main .markdown .text,body.reader-black-font input,body.reader-black-font select,body.reader-black-font textarea{font-family:-apple-system,SF UI Text,Arial,PingFang SC,Hiragino Sans GB,Microsoft YaHei,WenQuanYi Micro Hei,sans-serif}body{background:#f6f7f8}.ext-link__wrapper{position:absolute;width:620px;padding:40px 0;border-radius:6px;text-align:center;top:118px;left:50%;-webkit-transform:translateX(-50%);-ms-transform:translateX(-50%);transform:translateX(-50%);background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 1px 3px rgba(27,95,160,.1);overflow:hidden}.title{font-size:22px;color:#2f2f2f}.sub-title{font-size:16px;color:#888;margin-top:8px}.link-bd{display:-webkit-box;display:-webkit-flex;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-align:center;-webkit-align-items:center;-ms-flex-align:center;align-items:center;width:460px;margin:12px auto 0;padding:10px;border-radius:4px;background:#ebf6ff;border:1px solid #dceaf5;zoom:1}.link-bd:after,.link-bd:before{content:" ";display:table}.link-bd .link-bd__icon{-webkit-flex-shrink:0;-ms-flex-negative:0;flex-shrink:0;display:flex;align-items:center;width:40px;justify-content:center;height:40px;line-height:40px;font-size:20px;background:#bcc6d8;text-align:center;border-radius:2px}.link-btn{text-align:center;font-size:0;margin-top:24px}.link-bd .link-bd__text{font-size:14px;color:#006cbe;margin-left:10px;overflow:hidden;-o-text-overflow:ellipsis;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap}.link-btn__text{display:inline-block;width:144px;height:44px;line-height:43px;border-radius:22px;font-size:14px;color:#006cbe;border:1px solid #006cbe;cursor:pointer;text-decoration:none}.link-btn__text:hover{color:#fff;background:#006cbe}
.alert-footer {
  margin: 0 auto;
  height: 90px;
  width: 130px;
  padding-top: 30px;
}
.alert-footer-icon {
  float: left;
  margin-top: 10px;
  margin-right: 6px;
}
.alert-footer-text {
  float: left;
  border-left: 2px solid #EEE;
  padding: 3px 0 0 5px;
  height: 60px;
  color: #0B85CC;
  font-size: 12px;
  text-align: left;
  
}
.alert-footer-text p {
  color: #7A7A7A;
  font-size: 22px;
  line-height: 18px;
  margin-top: 0px;
}
&lt;/style>
&lt;/head>
&lt;body>    
&lt;div class="ext-link__wrapper">
        &lt;img src="/wp-content/themes/zibll/img/logo.png" width="200" style="margin-bottom: 30px;">&lt;!--可修改成自己的LOGO--> 
        &lt;div class="title">即将跳转到外部网站&lt;/div>
        &lt;div class="sub-title">跳转网站安全性未知，是否继续&lt;/div>
        &lt;div class="link-bd">
            &lt;div class="link-bd__icon">&lt;svg t="1585116627498" class="icon" viewBox="0 0 1024 1024" version="1.1"
                    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" p-id="2855" width="32" height="32">
                    &lt;path

<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">样式一：</h1>

    &lt;fieldset  style=" border: 1.5px dashed #008cff; padding: 10px; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 2em;font-weight: 700;color: var(--key-color);background-color: var(--body-bg-color);">

        版权声明
      &lt;/legend>
      &lt;span class="btn-info btn-xs">1&lt;/span> 本网站名称：&lt;span style="color: #3333ff">&lt;span style="color: #09ace2; font-size: 18px">&lt;strong>觅知博客&lt;/strong>&lt;/span>&lt;/span>&lt;br />

<p><strong> 1、后台设置---&gt;外观---&gt;小工具---&gt;添加自定义HTML代码,加到合适侧边栏即可 </strong>：我是添加在首页侧边栏</p>

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;canvas id="canvas" style="width:100%;" width="820" height="2">&lt;/canvas>

<!-- wp:image {"id":1191,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->

<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18612" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">24、文章页底部添加【感谢您的来访，获取更多精彩文章请收藏本站+图片。】</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18612"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、<strong>网站管理后台---》主题设置---》文章&amp;列表---》文章页</strong> <strong>---》</strong> <strong>文章页</strong>  在文章内容后-插入内容 ，把下面的php代码复制粘贴到里面即可。 </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2、此代码理论上适用所有主题，只需要在合适的地方添加上代码就行</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3、代码中的图片我托管在jsdelivr+github，可直接引用，部分的文字可修改成自己的</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">效果演示</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1305,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-56-1024x499.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1305"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18599" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">25、 文章内图片鼠标移动到图片外边框自动发光</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18599"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、很多时候网页背景也是白的,图片整体也是白色的,有的时候用户不好区分，这是图片还是网页,图片弄个外边框就好区分了,当然图片是鼠标移动到图片上才会显示边框</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2、 <strong>网站管理后台---》子比主题设置---》自定义代码---》自定CSS代码</strong>，把下面的css代码复制粘贴到里面即可。  </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>里面的8px大小可自行调节，颜色代码#63B8FF也可自行设置</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*鼠标移动图片外发光*/
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
.wp-posts-content img:hover {
box-shadow:0px 0px 8px #63B8FF;
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">效果图：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1425,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-7-1024x649.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1425"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_18953" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined"><strong>26、防止盗用代码禁止F12和打开网页控制台快捷键</strong></qc></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_18953"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>虽然这个功能有些鸡肋，不过是可以避免大部分的快捷键打开网站控制台，要查看你网站的源码还是要费点劲的。</li><li><strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">网站管理后台-</qc>--》<qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">子比主题设置</qc>---》<qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">自定义代码</qc>---》<qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">自定义底部HTML代码</qc></strong>，把下面的css代码复制粘贴到里面即可。   </li><li>其他主题的话在你的主题目录下的，<strong>footer.php</strong>文件中下面添加下面的代码：</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1432,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-8-1024x261.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1432"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 data-color="#ef0c7e" class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme" style="--theme-color:#ef0c7e">自定义HTML代码</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--安全1开始-->
&lt;script type="text/javascript">
        window.onload = function(){
            document.onkeydown = function (){
                var e = window.event || arguments[0];
                //F12
                if(e.keyCode == 123){
                    return false;
                //Ctrl+Shift+I
                }else if((e.ctrlKey) &amp;&amp; (e.shiftKey) &amp;&amp; (e.keyCode == 73)){
                    return false;
                //Shift+F10
                }else if((e.shiftKey) &amp;&amp; (e.keyCode == 121)){
                    return false;
                //Ctrl+U
                }else if((e.ctrlKey) &amp;&amp; (e.keyCode == 85)){
                    return false;
                }
            };
            document.oncontextmenu = function (){
                return false;
            }
        }
    &lt;/script>
&lt;!--by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn-->
&lt;!--安全1结束--></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_13521" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">27、长文章分页按钮美化</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_13521"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>wordpress自带的分页按钮是比较丑的很突兀，经过社长一段下面的CSS代码优化之后会变得更加美观</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><code>子比主题添加路径： </code></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p> <li><strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">网站管理后台-</qc>--》<qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">子比主题设置</qc>---》<qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">自定义代码</qc>---》<qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">自定义CSS样式</qc></strong>，把下面的css代码复制粘贴到里面即可。</li></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 data-color="#ef0c7e" class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme" style="--theme-color:#ef0c7e">自定义CSS代码</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*文章分页按钮美化*/
.post-page-numbers{padding: 4px 10px;text-align:center;display: inline; }.post-nav-links{background:0;margin-left: -50px;}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 data-color="#ef0c7e" class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme" style="--theme-color:#ef0c7e">效果演示：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- /wp:image --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->

<!-- /wp:zibllblock/postsbox --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_14527" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">29、友情链接右侧申请按钮动态美化</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_14527"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->

<p><strong>添加方法：</strong> <strong>后台设置---&gt;外观---&gt;小工具---&gt;添加Zibll 链接列表(新版),加到标题右侧按钮即可</strong> </p>

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17686" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">31、友链图片圆角样式</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17686"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>未优化之前友链的图片是方方正正的，不太好看，优化一下之后顺眼很多</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*友链头像圆角*/
/*by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn*/
.link-only-img img{border-radius: var(--main-radius);}
.link-img img{border-radius: var(--main-radius);}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">效果演示：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1631,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/mizhibk/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2021090603550364.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1631"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_11250" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined"><strong>32、进入网站提醒来源地址和问候语客户端信息</strong></qc></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_11250"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>社长已经添加判断代码，添加之后只会在首页显示，其他页面不显示 </strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><span class="has-inline-color has-vivid-red-color">1.将下面的PHP代码加入到主题目录下：themes/zibll/functions.php文件中。</span></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!-- 进入网站提醒来源地址和问候语客户端信息开始 -->   
&lt;?php if (is_home ()) : ?> 
&lt;div id="fps" style="z-index:5;position:fixed;bottom:3px;left:3px;color:#2196F3;font-size:10px;-webkit-pointer-events: none;    -moz-pointer-events: none;    -ms-pointer-events: none;    -o-pointer-events: none;">&lt;/div>    
&lt;script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98dou.cn@main/jsheji/fetch.min.js">&lt;/script>    &lt;script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98dou.cn@main/jsheji/layer.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">&lt;/script>    
&lt;script>    /*网站打开提醒代码开始*/    $(function(){        if(/*getCookie('msg') !=*/ 1){            var t = document.createElement("a");            t.href = document.referrer;            var msgTitle = t.hostname;            var name = t.hostname.split(".")[1];            if("" !== document.referrer){                switch (name) {                    case 'bing':                        msgTitle = '必应搜索';                        break;                    case 'baidu':                        msgTitle = '百度搜索';                        break;                    case 'so':                        msgTitle = '360搜索';                        break;                    case 'google':                        msgTitle = '谷歌搜索';                        break;                    case 'sm':                        msgTitle = '神马搜索';                        break;                    case 'sogou':                        msgTitle = '搜狗搜索';                        break;                    default:                        msgTitle =  t.hostname;                };            };            var time = (new Date).getHours();            var msg = '';            23 &lt; time || time &lt;= 5 ? msg = "你是夜猫子呀？这么晚还不睡觉，明天起的来嘛？":            5&lt; time &amp;&amp; time &lt;= 7 ? msg = "早上好！一日之计在于晨，美好的一天就要开始了！":            7&lt; time &amp;&amp; time &lt;= 11 ? msg = "上午好！工作顺利嘛，不要久坐，多起来走动走动哦！":            11&lt; time &amp;&amp; time &lt;= 14 ? msg = "中午了，工作了一个上午，现在是午餐时间！":            14&lt; time &amp;&amp; time &lt;= 17 ? msg = "午后很容易犯困呢，今天的运动目标完成了吗？":            17&lt; time &amp;&amp; time &lt;= 19 ? msg = "傍晚了！窗外夕阳的景色很美丽呢，最美不过夕阳红~":            19&lt; time &amp;&amp; time &lt;= 21 ? msg = "晚上好，今天过得怎么样？":            21&lt; time &amp;&amp; time &lt;= 23 &amp;&amp; (msg = "已经这么晚了呀，早点休息吧，晚安~");            $.ajax({                type:"get",                url:"https://api.gmit.vip/Api/UserInfo/",                async:true,                success:function(data){                    window.info = data;                    layer.msg("Hi~ 来自"+ data.data.location + '~&lt;br/>通过 '+msgTitle+' 进来的朋友！&lt;br/>使用 '+ data.data.os +"&lt;br/>"+ data.data.browser +' 访问本站！' + '&lt;br/>' + msg);                    var showFPS = (function(){                        var requestAnimationFrame =                            window.requestAnimationFrame ||                            window.webkitRequestAnimationFrame ||                            window.mozRequestAnimationFrame ||                            window.oRequestAnimationFrame ||                            window.msRequestAnimationFrame ||                            function(callback) {                                window.setTimeout(callback, 1000/60);                            };                        var e,pe,pid,fps,last,offset,step,appendFps;                         fps = 0;                        last = Date.now();                        step = function(){                            offset = Date.now() - last;                            fps += 1;                            if( offset >= 1000 ){                            last += offset;                            appendFps(fps);                            fps = 0;                            };                            requestAnimationFrame( step );                        };                        appendFps = function(fps){                            var settings = {                                timeout: 5000,                                logError: true                            };                            $('#fps').html('&lt;span style="float:left;">'+fps+'FPS&lt;/span>&lt;br/>&lt;span style="float:left">'+window.info.data.os+'&lt;/span>&lt;br/>&lt;span style="float:left;margin-top:1px;">'+window.info.data.browser+'&lt;/span>&lt;br/>&lt;span style="float:left;margin-top:1px;">'+window.info.data.location+'&lt;/span>&lt;br/>&lt;span style="float:left;margin-top:1px;">&lt;/span>');                        };                        step();                    })();                }            });        };    });    &lt;/script>
&lt;?php endif; ?>
&lt;!--by：觅知博客-www.98dou.cn-->
&lt;!-- 进入网站提醒来源地址和问候语客户端信息开始 -->   </code></pre>

					</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[WordPress设置网站动态标题[WP教程]]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/496.html</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 08 Jul 2021 08:48:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=496</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>我们经常逛别人的网站，有些网站当我们离开该页面浏览其他页面的时候，我们在离开的页面上面会看到比如本站的“你别走吖 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ”这样的字样，当我们点回来的时候页面上面会看到“(/≧▽≦/)你又回来了！”的字样。那么我们如何实现呢？其实很简单，只需一句javascript语句即可实现。请看下面的教程。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>使用教程<br>（具体看本站动态标题）在<strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">后台主题设置---&gt;自定义代码---&gt;自定义javascript代码把下面的代码添加到里面即可实现。</qc></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//网站动态标题开始 
var OriginTitile = document.title,
titleTime;
document.addEventListener("visibilitychange",
function() {
    if (document.hidden) {
        document.title = "你别走吖 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ";
        clearTimeout(titleTime)
    } else {
        document.title = "(/≧▽≦/)你又回来啦！ " ;
        titleTime = setTimeout(function() {
            document.title = OriginTitile
        },
        2000)
    }
});
//网站动态标题结束
</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>注：</strong>代码中“你别走吖 Σ(っ °Д °;)っ”和“(/≧▽≦/)你又回来啦！”可自行修改成自己喜欢的标题文字。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[WordPress侧边栏添加滚动播报小工具[WP小工具]]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/502.html</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 08 Jul 2021 09:02:12 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=502</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 id="wznav_0">前言</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>滚动播报这是从网上找来的小工具，在本站一直使用到现在，很多网站也都在分享滚动播报小工具，所以一直没有写一篇文章分享滚动播报小工具，不过有小伙伴需要，所以今天就水一篇文章吧！我们不是小工具的创造者，我们只是小工具的搬运工。O(∩_∩)O哈哈~下面就分享滚动播报小工具教程给大家！</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 id="wznav_1">食用教程</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>其实很简单，就一段代码！只需在<strong>后台</strong>---&gt;<strong>外观</strong>---&gt;<strong>小工具</strong>---&gt;<strong>自定义HTML</strong>添加下面的代码，把它放在合适的位置（本站放在侧边栏），然后就可以啦。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;section id="custom_html-2" class="widget_text widget widget_custom_html mar16-b">
  &lt;meta charset="utf-8">
  &lt;!--&lt;p  align="center"  class="widget-title l1 box-header">欢迎访问觅知博客小站&lt;/p>-->
  &lt;div class="textwidget custom-html-widget">
  &lt;aside id="php_text-8" 
  class="widget php_text wow fadeInUp" data-wow-delay="0.3s">
  &lt;div class="textwidget widget-text">
    &lt;style type="text/css">#container-box-1{color:#526372;text-transform:uppercase;width:100%;font-size:16px;
    line-height:50px;text-align:center}#flip-box-1{overflow:hidden;height:50px}#flip-box-1 div{height:50px}#flip-box-1>div>div{color:#fff;display:inline-block;text-align:center;height:50px;width:100%}#flip-box-1 
    div:first-child{animation:show 8s linear infinite}.flip-box-1-1{background-color:#FF7E40}.flip-box-1-2{background-color:#C166FF}.flip-box-1-3{background-color:#737373}.flip-box-1-4{background-color:#4ec7f3}
    .flip-box-1-5{background-color:#42c58a}.flip-box-1-6{background-color:#F1617D}@keyframes
    show{0%{margin-top:-300px}5%{margin-top:-250px}16.666%{margin-top:-250px}21.666%{margin-top:-200px}33.332%{margin-top:-200px}38.332%{margin-top:-150px}49.998%{margin-top:-150px}54.998%{margin-top:-100px}66.664%{margin-top:-100px}71.664%{margin-top:-50px}83.33%{margin-top:-50px}88.33%{margin-top:0px}99.996%{margin-top:0px}100%{margin-top:300px}}&lt;/style>&lt;div id="container-box-1">

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">效果图展示</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":503,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/image-3.png" alt="" class="wp-image-503"/></figure>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">使用教程：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>也很简单，只需要在两个文件中添加一行代码就可以实现，具体演示效果可以查看本站觅知博客的效果</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>1、后台主题设置—&gt;自定义代码—&gt;自定义CSS样式代码把下面的代码添加到里面</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>自定义CSS代码：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*左边联系站长css开始*/
.contact-help{position: fixed; z-index: 101; left: 0; top: calc(50% - 30px); margin-top: -36px; width: 28px; height: 72px; transition: all .3s; font-size: 12px;background: var(--main-bg-color);border-radius: 0 5px 5px 0; padding: 8px 7px; line-height: 14px;}@media screen and (max-width: 768px){.contact-help{display:none;}}
/*左边联系站长css开始*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2、在主题目录下themes/zibll/footer.php下，添加下面的PHP代码：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>PHP代码：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">&lt;!--左侧联系站长-->
&lt;a href="http://wpa.qq.com/msgrd?v=3&amp;uin=1426239465&amp;site=qq&amp;menu=yes" target="_blank" class="contact-help main-shadow"  style="font-weight:700;" />联系站长&lt;/a></code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":511,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/image-4-1024x600.png" alt="" class="wp-image-511"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>说明：PHP代码的HTML代码<strong>内容、链接</strong>，可自行修改。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

		<title><![CDATA[WordPress主题Zibll子比主题V5.4免授权+美化教程]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/517.html</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 09 Jul 2021 08:13:47 +0000</pubDate>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">主题简介：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>简约优雅的设计风格、模块化组件、商城支付系统，全面的前端功能、深度SEO优化、专注阅读体验。</li><li>Zibll子主题是专为阅读网站而设计的，设计简单大方，功能全面。</li><li>UI界面模块化，多种布局，多种显示效果可供选择，高度自由化，更容易匹配自己喜欢的网站。</li><li>主题支持付费阅读、付费下载功能和用户VIP会员系统，为站长提供强大的生产力。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:html -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">主题特色</h1>



<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-feature feature feature-default" data-icon="fa-magic" data-color="#09ACE2"><div class="feature-icon"><i style="color:#09ACE2" class="fa fa-magic"></i></div><div class="feature-title">简约优雅的设计</div><div class="feature-note">现代化简约设计，更优雅的阅读体验</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-feature feature feature-default" data-icon="fa-user" data-color="#09ACE2"><div class="feature-icon"><i style="color:#09ACE2" class="fa fa-user"></i></div><div class="feature-title">前端用户功能</div><div class="feature-note">更全面的用户中心，VIP会员系统</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-feature feature feature-default" data-icon="fa-window-restore" data-color="#09ACE2"><div class="feature-icon"><i style="color:#09ACE2" class="fa fa-window-restore"></i></div><div class="feature-title">模块化组件</div><div class="feature-note">可视化模块编辑，页面高度自由化</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-feature feature feature-default" data-icon="fa fa-cloud-download" data-color="#09ACE2"><div class="feature-icon"><i style="color:#09ACE2" class="fa fa fa-cloud-download"></i></div><div class="feature-title">在线下载</div><div class="feature-note">在线下载，优雅的安装体验</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-feature feature feature-default" data-icon="fa-tachometer" data-color="#fb2121"><div class="feature-icon"><i style="color:#fb2121" class="fa fa-tachometer"></i></div><div class="feature-title">自定义主题</div><div class="feature-note">自带深色主题，头部、底部主题独立设置</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-feature feature feature-default" data-icon="fa-newspaper-o" data-color="#fb2121"><div class="feature-icon"><i style="color:#fb2121" class="fa fa-newspaper-o"></i></div><div class="feature-title">强大的编辑器</div><div class="feature-note">超多的古腾堡编辑器块，超爽的写作体验</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-feature feature feature-default" data-icon="fa-bolt" data-color="#fb2121"><div class="feature-icon"><i style="color:#fb2121" class="fa fa-bolt"></i></div><div class="feature-title">快！再快一点</div><div class="feature-note">代码逻辑深度优化、动态加载，让加载更快</div></div>



<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-feature feature feature-default" data-icon="fa-book" data-color="#fb2121"><div class="feature-icon"><i style="color:#fb2121" class="fa fa-book"></i></div><div class="feature-title">超多实用功能</div><div class="feature-note">主题功能超200项，更符合国人使用</div></div>



<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">部分特色功能</h1>



<div class="wp-block-columns">
<div class="wp-block-column">
<ul><li>自定义网站图标、logo</li><li>自带夜间模式主题</li><li>三种网站布局，各页面布局独立设置</li><li>全站seo优化，各页面独立seo设置</li><li>百度资源实时推送，自动提交</li><li>自定义全局主题色</li><li>多种导航布局，电脑端手机端独立设置</li><li>导航、页脚主题独立自定义</li><li>全局加载动画</li><li>前端登录、注册，自带社会化登录</li><li>前端用户中心，修改资料、头像</li><li>前端发布文章、独立打赏功能</li><li>文章自动生成目录树</li><li>文章图片灯箱、 文章高度限制 </li><li>文章点赞、收藏、文章封面设置</li><li>多种文章格式：图片、画廊、视频、标准</li><li>文章封面支持幻灯片显示</li><li>文章列表多种显示模式：卡片、多图、幻灯片</li><li>首页文章多栏目显示</li><li>文章专题功能、首页专题列表显示</li><li>强大的幻灯片功能、导航栏幻灯片功能</li><li>搜索热门关键词功能</li></ul>
</div>



<div class="wp-block-column">
<ul><li>付费下载、付费阅读、推广返佣</li><li>VIP会员系统功能</li><li>图像异步加载</li><li>全站JS代码动态加载</li><li>文章AJAX动态加载</li><li>站内消息系统、用户私信系统</li><li>分类、标签、专题独立封面设置</li><li>分类、标签、专题 独立AJAX列表</li><li>自动获取缩略图、缩略图尺寸设置</li><li>精彩一言功能，支持替换签名</li><li>文章生成分享海报功能</li><li>评论AJAX提交、AJAX翻页</li><li>评论支持插入表情、高亮代码、上传图片</li><li>支持百度熊掌号功能</li><li>多个自定义代码位置</li><li>外链重定向转内链功能</li><li>分类url去除category该功能</li><li>大量Wordpress优化功能</li><li>自在邮件SMTP功能</li><li>全局代码高亮功能，10+高亮主题可选</li><li>JS框架文件CDN加速</li><li>前端快速设置链接功能</li></ul>



<p></p>
</div>
</div>
<!-- /wp:html -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">更新日志</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 id="wznav_1">V5.4</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2021-05-28</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>新功能</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>新增会员免费资源限制每日下载次数的功能(主题设置-商城付费-付费会员-会员权益)</li><li>付费资源新增购买权限功能，实现仅会员可购买、会员专享资源等功能</li><li>新增文章随机备用缩略图功能(主题设置-文章列表-备用缩略图)</li><li>视频文章新增视频剧集功能<a href="https://demo.zibll.com/1316.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">【查看演示】</a></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>优化内容</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>优化大量 php 函数缓存逻辑，使用Redis或Memcached缓存后效果提升明显<a href="https://www.zibll.com/1997.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">【查看教程】</a></li><li>优化图片灯箱弹出逻辑，修复部分情况下不能弹出的 bug</li><li>修复无侧边栏文章限制高度功能无法展开的 bug</li><li>修复部分浏览器下提醒消息没有背景色的 bug</li><li>修复部分情况下文章不显示图片的 bug</li><li>后台用户列表可能会显示不全的 bug</li><li>优化超级嵌入模块内容为异步懒加载，提高页面加载速度</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2 id="wznav_2">V5.3</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2021-04-30</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>新功能</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>新增易支付收款接口</li><li>图片灯箱功能单图模式增加双击缩放、移动端双指缩放功能</li><li>图片灯箱功能新增下载、缩放、播放功能及按钮开关</li><li>图片灯箱功能增加缩略图导航功能<a href="https://www.zibll.com/683.html">【查看教程】</a></li><li>优化图片灯箱双指缩放功能</li><li>优化图片灯箱下滑关闭功能</li><li>幻灯片相关模块的切换速度设置新增自动模式(根据不同设备尺寸动态设置)功能</li><li>新增隐藏内容-输入密码查看功能(类似关注微信公众号获取密码查看等引流功能)<a href="https://www.zibll.com/853.html">【查看教程】</a></li><li>新增评论有新的回复邮件通知、站内信通知</li><li>新增禁止非管理员禁止进入后台的选项开关</li><li>新增允许SVG图片上传的选项，默认关闭，防止XSS漏洞</li><li>新增文章目录树显示在移动端弹出菜单内的选项开关</li><li>新增 外链重定向功能设置排除域名功能</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>优化内容</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>优化图像异步懒加载动画效果，避免出现长时间空白的现象</li><li>优化文章内图片异步加载功能支持第三方对象储存</li><li>修复幻灯片开启按比例自动高度后可能会出现错位的bug</li><li>优化文章中插入表格的宽度自适应</li><li>优化外链重定向功能显示路径</li><li>修复评论模块图像显示出错的 bug</li><li>修复幻灯片古腾堡块同时添加两个会显示出错的bug</li><li>修复热榜文章模块显示时间功能无效的 bug</li><li>修复聚合模块可能会不显示总阅读数量的bug</li><li>修复发布文章可能会出错的bug</li><li>优化大量js函数，提高执行效率</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[苹果cmsv10魔加1.16去授权版【独家修复已支持最新苹果cms】]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/574.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Jul 2021 03:55:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=574</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">主题简介</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3.1更新记录<br>鉴于某些人才觉得弹窗公告是挂的后门，本站现推出有弹窗公告和无弹窗公告两个版本。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>请自行下载，自行引用。弹窗公告内容修改路径，tc.html，使用cookie方法记录。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>p&gt;购买后两个版本都有。<br>更新记录<br>已修复最新版苹果cms模板后台点击保存提示登录问题。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>已完美支持最新苹果cms，无后门，已测试。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>模板介绍<br>苹果CMSv10多功能响应式主题魔加影视模板（大橙子升级版），去授权破解版</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>主题优化：全站响应式　自带主题设置面板（模板后台）方便一键操作　资源采集功能优化</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>主题模块：视频　文章　专题　明星　用户中心　站内公告　影院热映</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>搜索功能：搜索联想　热门搜索　搜索记录　一键求片　同音字搜索</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>视频功能：播放记录　切换接口　视频报错　自动播放下一集</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>更多模板细节请看演示站</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>– 后台快捷菜单配置添加<br>– 魔加主题,/index.php/label/admin</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- /wp:image -->

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[WordPress给你的博客网站换个漂亮的字体[WP美化]]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/579.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Jul 2021 12:20:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=579</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>大多数站长在使用博客初期，喜欢魔改美化自己的网站，博客的建设主要方便访客高质量的阅读 所以对字体的选择非常重要，本期博主给大家出一期如果给自己的博客资源网自定义自己喜欢的字体</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">教程开始</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1.首先下载自己喜欢的字体包 在这里我给大家推荐一款免费的字体下载站</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/buttons -->
<div data-quantity="1" data-radius="true" class="wp-block-zibllblock-buttons radius"><span class="an_1 but b-blue"><strong><a href="https://www.100font.com/" data-type="URL" data-id="https://www.100font.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">100字体下载站</a></strong></span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/buttons -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2.转换字体包格式</strong><br>当我们下载字体之后会有一个压缩包 里面会有一个.ttf的字体文件包<br>因为有些浏览器不支持这种字体的格式显示 所以我们需要对字体格式转换<br>如果不进行转换字体格式，有些浏览器会无法显示自己设置的喜欢的字体 如果你毫无技术不会转换字体格式不要怕，这里提供一个免费快捷的字体转换网站</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/buttons -->
<div data-quantity="1" data-radius="true" class="wp-block-zibllblock-buttons radius"><span class="an_1 but b-blue"><strong><a href="https://convertio.co/zh/font-converter/" data-type="URL" data-id="https://convertio.co/zh/font-converter/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">字体格式在线转换网站</a></strong></span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/buttons -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>你只需要转换.ttf文件为eot,woff,woff2,svg,tff 以上格式随便一种 如下图，我已经用红色框框给你标记，按图操作即可</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":581,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/image-15-1024x615.png" alt="" class="wp-image-581"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">网站调用字体</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>把你转换好的5个字体文件放在自己网站随便那个文件夹内，只需要记住地址就行</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>我放在自己的根目录下的-案例：<strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">https://98dou.cn/fzlty.ttf</qc></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>如果是WordPress子比主题的话直接把下面的css代码放在自定义css样式中</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*全站字体美化开始*/
@font-face{
font-family: 'moe';
src:  url('https://98dou.cn/fzlty.ttf');
src:  url('https://98dou.cn/fzlty.otf');
src:  url('https://98dou.cn/fzlty.dfont');
src:  url('https://98dou.cn/fzlty.eot');
src:  url('https://98dou.cn/fzlty.svg');
src:  url('https://98dou.cn/fzlty.woff');
src:  url('https://98dou.cn/fzlty.woff2');
}
body{
font-family:'moe';
}
.enlighter-default .enlighter{max-height:400px;overflow-y:auto !important;}.lazyloading:not(.swiper-lazy-loaded){opacity: 0;}@media (max-width:640px) {
    .meta-right .meta-view{
      display: unset !important;
    }
  }
/*全站字体美化开始*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>注：</strong>（<strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">非常重要</qc></strong>）font-family是自定义字体名称（自己修改），url这是字体文件的地址（自己修改），*这是全局显示。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>将以上代码添加你的主题文件css样式即可。子比主题路径：<strong>后台主题设置—&gt;自定义代码—&gt;自定义CSS样式代码把下面的代码添加到里面</strong> 然后刷新页面即可</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>今天给大家分享一款图片压缩网站PHP程序源码，感兴趣的快来了解一下吧！<br></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">正文</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>一款很好看的图片压缩网站源码，原本的源码引用的国外js站点，我给下载放到本地调用了，访问速度更快。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[彩虹外链网盘程序V5.2.1更新 支持图片违规检测 全新界面]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/593.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Jul 2021 14:07:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=593</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":594,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/image-18-1024x576.png" alt="" class="wp-image-594"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">彩虹外链网盘V5.2更新 全新界面 支持图片违规检测</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>彩虹外链网盘，是一款PHP网盘与外链分享程序，支持所有格式文件的上传，可以生成文件外链、图片外链、音乐视频外链，生成外链同时自动生成相应的UBB代码和HTML代码，还可支持文本、图片、音乐、视频在线预览，这不仅仅是一个网盘，更是一个图床亦或是音乐在线试听网站。新版本增加了图片违规检测，对接阿里云内容安全服务。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">v5.2更新内容：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1.增加又拍云和华为云OBS存储<br>2.修复二维码显示<br>3.增加上传API接口</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[最新多站合一音乐搜索器v1.7.4最新修复版源码]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/596.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Jul 2021 15:23:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=596</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":597,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/image-19.png" alt="" class="wp-image-597"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>多站合一音乐搜索器，是由麦葱（<a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://github.com/maicong/music/releases" target="_blank">GitHub</a>）开发的，由于原作者停止维护，音乐接口纷纷失效，因此现在分享一下我修复的版本，目前支持搜索试听以下网站音乐：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="http://blog.cccyun.cn/post-314.html">多站合一音乐搜索器最新修复版源码</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>建议用国内主机搭建！因为很多音乐网站有地域限制只能在国内使用。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><a href="http://music.163.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">网易云音乐</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://y.qq.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">QQ 音乐</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.kugou.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">酷狗音乐</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.kuwo.cn/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">酷我音乐</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.xiami.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">虾米音乐</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://music.baidu.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">百度音乐</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.1ting.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">一听音乐</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://music.migu.cn/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">咪咕音乐</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.lizhi.fm/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">荔枝 FM</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.qingting.fm/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">蜻蜓 FM</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://www.ximalaya.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">喜马拉雅 FM</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://5sing.kugou.com/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">5sing</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">Demo / 演示地址</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/buttons -->
<div data-quantity="1" data-radius="true" class="wp-block-zibllblock-buttons radius"><span class="an_1 but b-blue"><a href="https://98dou.cn/yinyue" data-type="URL" data-id="https://98dou.cn/yinyue" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://98dou.cn/yinyue</a></span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/buttons -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">Changelog / 更新日志</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>2019.11.06 v1.7.1 修复全部音乐接口，优化音乐搜索速度</li><li>2021.01.13 v1.7.2 修复百度等部分音乐接口</li><li>2021.04.03 v1.7.3 修复百度、酷我等音乐接口</li><li>2021.05.17 v1.7.4 删除虾米音乐</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[开源在线解密qmc和ncm等音乐加密格式的网站unlock-music]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/604.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Jul 2021 15:44:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=604</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>这是一个可以在线解密QQ音乐、网易云音乐付费音乐加密格式的网站。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>由于程序编写使用了ES6语法，Blob，Web Worker特性，过旧的浏览器可能无法使用。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>GitHub项目地址：<a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://github.com/ix64/unlock-music" target="_blank">https://github.com/ix64/unlock-music</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/buttons -->
<div data-quantity="1" data-radius="true" class="wp-block-zibllblock-buttons radius"><span class="an_1 but b-purple"><a href="https://unlock-music-ix.netlify.app/" data-type="URL" data-id="https://unlock-music-ix.netlify.app/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener"><strong>演示demo地址</strong></a></span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/buttons -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[一行简单的代码实现网站全局变灰操作方式及教程方法]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/608.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 10 Jul 2021 16:10:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=608</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>前言</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>网站全体变灰主要在用于哀悼缅怀烈士和悼念日使用</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":610,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/image-23-1024x598.png" alt="" class="wp-image-610"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">使用教程：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>也很简单，只需要在两个文件中添加一行代码就可以实现，具体演示效果可以查看上方截图的效果</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>1、后台主题设置—&gt;自定义代码—&gt;自定义CSS样式代码把下面的代码添加到里面</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>自定义CSS代码：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第一种代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*网站整体灰白开始一*/
body {
-webkit-filter: grayscale(100%); /* webkit */
-moz-filter: grayscale(100%); /*firefox*/
-ms-filter: grayscale(100%); /*ie9*/
-o-filter: grayscale(100%); /*opera*/
filter: grayscale(100%);
}
/*网站整体灰白一结束*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>第二种代码：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/*网站整体灰白开始一*/
html{
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);
            filter: grayscale(100%);
}
/*网站整体灰白开始二结束*/</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[宝塔面板一键卸载教程：完全清理删除宝塔面板并重新开始]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/621.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 11 Jul 2021 14:56:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=621</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">注意事项：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>重装完之后，所有数据都没了，自然也就实现了卸载的目的。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>但是，重装之前，一定要做好数据备份，否则如果有重要的数据，丢失了就不好了。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">一、使用卸载命令进行卸载宝塔面板</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>宝塔官方有提供宝塔面板的卸载命令，使用这个卸载命令，我们就能将宝塔面板卸载掉。<br>Ps：这里有一点需要注意的，如果只卸载宝塔面板的同时，也希望将 Nginx、MySQL、PHP 等组件卸载掉，那么我们应该先在宝塔面板里面卸载掉以上软件后，再进行下面的步骤。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>登录服务器后台后，我们复制以下卸载命令并回车执行，即可一键卸载宝塔面板</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">/etc/init.d/bt stop &amp;&amp; chkconfig --del bt &amp;&amp; rm -f /etc/init.d/bt &amp;&amp; rm -rf /www/server/panel</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">利用脚本<strong>进行</strong>卸载宝塔面板及运行环境</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>除了使用卸载命令进行卸载外，我们也可以使用官方提供的卸载脚本进行卸载，同时这个卸载脚本会更暴力一些。<br>同样也是需要通过SSH登录搬瓦工VPS的，登录后，我们复制以下命令，然后依次执行即可：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">wget http://download.bt.cn/install/bt-uninstall.sh
 
sh bt-uninstall.sh</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>执行第二行命令后，会让我们进行以下选择：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>卸载宝塔</li><li>卸载宝塔及运行环境(可能影响站点、数据库及其他数据)</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>如果是单纯的卸载宝塔，需要保留 LNMP 等运行环境，则选择1选项；如果是想卸载宝塔和运行环境，则选择2选项。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>按照自己的需求，选择对应的选择，回车后即可卸载宝塔面板。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[苹果CMS海螺模板V16魔改版免授权带后台已修复BUG]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/643.html</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 12 Jul 2021 07:31:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://98dou.cn/?p=643</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:image {"id":644,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/image-25-1024x505.png" alt="" class="wp-image-644"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">V16魔改版使用说明</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>先添加分类，如推广，类型选择：文章，父级分类：顶级分类，排序：推荐填最大，分类模板：改为tg.html，保存即可。添加文章，分类设置：推广，推荐设置：5，审核：代表发布的文章开/关，填写：标题、备注、图片、简介、其他信息里设置：转跳URL、也可以查看：顶数量=点击数</li><li>海螺模板魔改设置里可设置推广页面信息。</li><li>需要用户浏览权限可在苹果CMS后台用户-用户组那里设置</li><li>其他的自行体验</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">《优化修复》</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>加入推广页面</li><li>加入广告弹窗</li><li>模板后台可设置弹窗过期时间</li><li>加入固定广告位</li><li>模板后台可设置广告过期时间</li><li>播放页加入剧场模式</li><li>播放页手机下拉跟随播放 更新修复排版</li><li>加入PC播放页下拉播放小窗口</li><li>加入顶部导航栏</li><li>影片样式修改</li><li>可设置19禁 为视频数据:设置推荐3</li><li>去除个人中心无用功能</li><li>今日推荐改为二四</li><li>顶部导航添加开关自适应</li><li>修复其他bug近乎完美！</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">安装说明：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>上传到苹果cms v10 根目录解压，网站后台切换模板，</li><li>网站模板和手机模板都是【conch】模板目录【moban】，清理缓存。</li><li>后台快捷地址<br>海螺模板,/admin.php/admin/conch/theme</li><li>幻灯片推荐9 大图模式需要上传海报图，建议尺寸1680px*580px 小图模式需设置3个推荐才显示</li><li>热播推荐1 建议推荐18个最佳。</li><li>切记一定要安装PHP扩展 《sg11》 php版本选择7.0~7.2。重要的事情说三遍！<br>切记一定要安装PHP扩展 《sg11》 php版本选择7.0~7.2。重要的事情说三遍！<br>切记一定要安装PHP扩展 《sg11》 php版本选择7.0~7.2。重要的事情说三遍！</li><li>更新模板说明：上传模板，</li><li>将本模板下的 conch/asset/admin/theme.html放进-路径/application/admin/view/conch/ 中<br>如果根目录 /application/admin/view/ 下没有 conch 新建文件夹即可</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">下载地址：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:group -->
<div class="wp-block-group"><div class="wp-block-group__inner-container"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>诸位影视创作人，大家好：</strong><strong>为了方便大家系统学习</strong><strong>、问题答疑，所有文档都在这里汇总，有需要自取</strong><strong>包含内容：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>中视频伙伴计划答疑</li><li>抖音基础运营手册</li><li>影视解说选片课程</li><li>电视剧解说文案课程</li><li>电影解说文案课程</li><li>影视混剪系列课程</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"left","level":1} -->
<h1 class="has-text-align-left">基础运营课程</h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>中视频伙伴计划答疑文档：</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>一拆三怎么拆分发布？收益怎么提现？单端删除会不会影响收益？单端审核不通过怎么办？ <strong>全看这个文档</strong><strong><a href="https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docs/doccnQJtmwrYMRIzRergFQFTdMb#" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">中视频伙伴计划答疑文档【补充中】</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>抖音影娱创作人基础问题答疑：</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>【汇总文档】<a href="https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docs/doccnkXIVM2hCoia0S7mtwRr2oe" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docs/doccnkXIVM2hCoia0S7mtwRr2oe</a> 【PPT】<a href="https://bytedance.feishu.cn/file/boxcnQv2mvcVV1khy1FuirxwMqf" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://bytedance.feishu.cn/file/boxcnQv2mvcVV1khy1FuirxwMqf</a> <strong>抖音怎么做？看这个文档就知道了！</strong>?<a href="https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docs/doccnptts7z9w8DtKJuE6tkbDGl" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">抖音运营手册（一）持续更新</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:separator -->
<hr class="wp-block-separator"/>
<!-- /wp:separator -->

<!-- wp:heading {"textAlign":"left","level":1} -->
<h1 class="has-text-align-left">影视解说系列培训课</h1>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
<h2>（三）影视解说文案技巧课</h2>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->

<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->

<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading -->
