					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[新版涟漪云蓝奏云网盘挂载程序源码v0.1.5]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1153.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 25 Aug 2021 03:32:35 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1153</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">涟漪云介绍</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>蓝奏云挂载程序，自由操作蓝奏云内文件（夹），并可解析直链下载等等。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1154,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/lanzou-1024x646.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1154"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">功能介绍：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>浏览任意目录内文件（夹）</li><li>批量移动文件</li><li>批量删除文件（夹）</li><li>重命名文件夹</li><li>新建文件夹</li><li>文件夹加密、描述及修改</li><li>文件直链</li><li>①id形式：推荐，对文件的重命名、移动等等都不影响直链；</li><li>②文件名形式：重命名、移动以及同文件夹分页位置的变化都会影响直链的有效性，且同分页下同名文件只能识别1个</li><li>③文件分享id形式：域名/文件分享id?pwd=分享密码（分享密码选填）</li><li>④文件夹分享id形式：域名/文件夹分享id/文件名?page=页码&amp;pwd=分享密码（页码和分享密码选填）</li><li>文件批量上传</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1155,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-12-1024x637.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1155"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">安装教程-详细</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>安装环境：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>1、PHP >= 5.6 (开启redis扩展)</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>2、下载源码，将源码上传至你的服务器</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>3、修改默认管理员登入密码</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1161,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-14-1024x512.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1161"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>4、网站配置伪静态</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Nginx ： 伪静态</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">if (!-e $request_filename) {
    rewrite ^/(-1|\d+|[bi][a-zA-Z0-9]+)(\.[\w]+|/([^/]+))?$ /api.php?id=$1&amp;name=$3 break;
}</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Apache：伪静态 </p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">RewriteEngine On

RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
RewriteRule ^(-1|\d+|[bi][a-zA-Z0-9]+)(\.\w+|/([^/]+))?$ /api.php?id=$1&amp;name=$3 [QSA,L]</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>5、最后一步也是最重要的一步，获取蓝奏云Cookie</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>进入蓝奏云网站，登入您的账户之后：浏览器进入F12控制台执行--输入以下代码，如下图</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">if(!/(^|\.)woozooo\.com$/i.test(document.location.host))
    throw new Error('请登录到蓝奏云控制台在执行此代码！');

var regex = /(?&lt;=^|;)\s*([^=]+)=\s*(.+?)\s*(?=;|$)/g,
    cookies = {},re;
while(re = regex.exec(document.cookie))
    if(re[1] === 'ylogin'||re[1] === 'phpdisk_info')
        cookies[re[1]] = re[1]+'='+re[2]+';';

if(!cookies.hasOwnProperty('phpdisk_info'))
    throw new Error('获取cookie失败，请确认您已登录到蓝奏云控制台！');

var copy = function (str) {
    var oInput = document.createElement('input');
    oInput.value = str;
    document.body.appendChild(oInput);
    oInput.select();
    document.execCommand("Copy");
    oInput.remove();
    alert('复制成功');
}

copy(Object.values(cookies).join(' '));</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1157,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/lanzou2-1024x566.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1157"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>6、填入上一步获取到的蓝奏云Cookie</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1156,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-13-1024x490.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1156"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">更新日志：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>修复js文件中substring函数导致的无法使用bug</li><li>修复带密码的分享文件id无限密码错误</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[WordPress博客评论Server酱微信通知插件V1.0.1]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1165.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 25 Aug 2021 06:16:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1165</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>在WordPress官方插件中正式上线微信通知插件，有的话也是英文版本的，很鸡肋。大都是一些代码版或者个人开发的通知插件，今天社长给大家分享一款自己一直再用的评论回复通知插件，可以便于没有各位博主在微信上也可以及时收到伙伴们在博客中评论动态。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1166,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-15-1024x621.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1166"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1169,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/微信图片_20210825141615-1024x471.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1169"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">安装插件教程：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、下载插件源码</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2、上传到服务器主题插件目录路径：<strong>wp-content/plugins</strong> 然后解压会看到一个名为：serverchan的文件</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3、返回WordPress后台设置找到：<strong>插件</strong>---<strong>ServerChan通知</strong>---<strong>启用</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>4、然后在设置---<strong>讨论</strong>---滑到最后，找到：<strong>Server酱</strong>，填写，获取到的：<strong>Sendkey</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1167,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/微信图片_20210825135238-1024x721.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1167"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 data-color="#fb2121" class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme" style="--theme-color:#fb2121"><br/> Sendkey获取视频教程</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:zibllblock/dplayer -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-dplayer new-dplayer post-dplayer" video-url="https://pro-xhb-video.oss-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/xmw/c732b641-0ca3-451d-b2a2-cf755f05d5de.mp4" media-id="" data-loop="" data-hide="" data-autoplay="" data-volume="1"><div class="graphic" style="padding-bottom:50%"><div class="abs-center text-center"><i class="fa fa-play-circle fa-4x muted-3-color opacity5"></i></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/dplayer -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>Sendkey获取地址：<a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://sct.ftqq.com" target="_blank">https://sct.ftqq.com</a></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">注意事项：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>问：</strong>如WorePress安装启用时提示，无法启用ServerChan通知插件错误地址：plugins/serverchan/serverchan.php on line 79</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>答：</strong>请检查Wordpress是否是最新版本目前最近版本V5.8  或者之前手动添加使用过Server酱通知代码版本导致函数重名出错</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>解决：</strong>更新 Wordpress 到最新版本，另删除或注释掉，之前添加的 Server酱 通知代码，然后在启用插件即可</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">Emlog Pro介绍</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>基于PHP\MySQL的博客及CMS建站系统，追求快速稳定、简单舒适的创作体验。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>喜欢简约化的朋友可以使用这款Emlog pro</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-34.png" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-30.png" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-31.png" alt=""/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">安装教程</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、很简单，下载程序源码之后直接解压到根目录，根据提示安装即可</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[聚好看的QQ/微信/支付宝/PayPal的支付(打赏)程序源码]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1206.html</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 27 Aug 2021 03:53:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1206</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">源码介绍：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>此款源码是使用JavaScript实现大部分功能的付款二维码合并程序，界面使用了渐变色，看上去很美观，你可以使用程序生成一张二维码，或者直接把你的二维码链接发送给对方。程序会通过User Agent识别对方的客户端，随即展示相应的内容。部署起来也是很方便的，只需要做下简单的配置，再丢到任何一个能够托管静态网页的服务里即可，这样我们可以用来搭建一个属于自己的支付(打赏)页面。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">测试功能：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>为了好看一点，添加了一个随机图片API（可自行更换）</li><li>QQ、微信、支付宝、生成收码二维码功能正常</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1207,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-35-1024x516.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1207"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">安装</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>直接下载源码上传服务群，编辑HTML文件中的收款码信息即可</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">源码特性：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>最小化的请求数，最大化的速度。</li><li>拥有详尽的代码注释，方便二次开发。</li><li>结合实际使用场景为每一种支付方式独立定制的展示样式。</li><li>高度可定制化，页面上一切内容均可通过简单的js代码更改。无需任何编程技巧。</li><li>除图片外的所有静态文件均默认使用jsDelivr分发。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[两款非常款好看的windows10桌面项目源码]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1211.html</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 27 Aug 2021 14:35:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1211</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>win10风格的后台UI框架。它使用了丰富的win10桌面元素，包括桌面图标、窗口化子页面管理、开始菜单、动态小磁贴等组件，兼容主流现代浏览器及移动端的屏幕尺寸，适合快速开发后台管理系统的前端界面。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">ylui款</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1215,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-39-1024x501.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1215"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">win10-ui款</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1221,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-43-1024x501.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1221"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">特色：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>纯前端实现，高兼容性</li><li>延续windows界面操作逻辑，普通用户上手难度较低</li><li>简单直观的多APP管理，像桌面程序一样呈现你的web应用</li><li>统一的APP交互模型，保持各APP之间的独立性，降低子系统耦合度，支持跨域的APP通信</li><li>完美复刻桌面操作系统的菜单、磁贴、通知元素，良好的视觉表现力</li><li>兼容PC、平板电脑、手机等各大主流分辨率</li><li>可视化开发，降低开发者的学习难度</li><li>基于VUE.JS开发，支持数据序列化（可配置化），方便与后台做数据存取接口</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1214,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-38-1024x538.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1214"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1213,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-37-1024x501.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1213"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">安装教程：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>安装也很简单，直接将源代码部署至您的web服务目录，如nginx、apache服务器的www目录下，访问对应网址<strong>（如http://127.0.0.1/ylui/）</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[Ndnav V1.1主题,WordPress主题 简洁大气导航主题]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1239.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 28 Aug 2021 10:04:10 +0000</pubDate>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">主题介绍</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>NDNAV主题是一款简约大气昼夜wordpress免费导航主题，这款主题界面、功能都非常简洁。 作者把这款定位为简约导航主题，所以这款wordpress导航主题没有过多的花里胡哨功能，也保证了这款主题的优化速度。 主题自带暗黑模式一键切换，多种功能模块随心搭配，更有游客自动投稿，可以说是免费wordpress导航主题中的良心之作了。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1240,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-46-858x1024.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1240"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">主题功能：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>昼夜双版，一键切换</li><li>多种功能卡片，随意搭配</li><li>体积小，速度快</li><li>界面优美，简约大气</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">内页演示</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1242,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->

<!-- /wp:image -->

		<title><![CDATA[最新冰狱域名防红系统 自带短网址7个接口全解密免授权源码]]></title>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>此源码社长亲测无错，目前7个短网址接口均正常是目前市面上最火的几个接口，有能力的可以自行添加短网址接口，另外码支付疑似跑路了，接口目前失效，可调用易支付</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">宝塔亲测环境安装教程：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>服务器系统：Linux+Centos7.0以上+宝塔</li><li>数据库无需手动配置访问下面地址配置即可</li><li>安装地址：你的域名+/install</li><li>后台地址：你的域名+/admin</li><li>默认管理员账号：admin密码：123456</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/fanghongjc.png" alt=""/><figcaption><strong>安装教程演示</strong></figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">主题特色：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>支持直连和跳转防洪可对接支付系统</li><li>首页前台五套模板自行更换</li><li>可查看生成短网址的访问数据</li><li>如有接口部分失效，自行更换</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1281,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-53-1024x876.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1281"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1280,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[金盾跨平台视频加密系统2019VIP版【无限制功能】]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1316.html</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 31 Aug 2021 06:46:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1316</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>做过是的朋友都应该知道，有些视频分享出去的时候不想让很多人看到，因此会有想把视频加密的软件，今天社长给大家分享一款</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">特色功能：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>1、灵活的认证授权模式，比如：一机一码加密，一码通授权等；可以指定播放次数、播放时间和截止日期等；</li><li>2、可以设置播放时断开网络，防止用户通过远程共享或者远程翻录；</li><li>3、可以设置播放时禁止开启其他窗口，以便学员可以专心学习；</li><li>4、您可以设置提示语，以便告知用户通过何种途径与您联系获得播放密码；</li><li>5、可以设置视频播放尺寸和拉伸效果；</li><li>6、可以防止流行的屏幕录像和拷屏；</li><li>7、可以禁止在流行的虚拟机中播放；</li><li>8、可以指定防翻录跟踪水印，水印可以是固定位置也可以随机浮动；</li><li>9、本系统也可以结合网络应用，通过网络向客户发放播放密码，结合会员验证等方式进行播放授权，无需人工参与；</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1317,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-58-867x1024.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1317"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">使用说明：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>利用金盾加密之后的视频需要配合文件中的【VIP专用播放器】进行播放授权，然后创建播放密码即可播放</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1319,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-60-905x1024.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1319"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1318,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-59-1024x723.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1318"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

		<title><![CDATA[个体工商户营业执照在线0成本快速办理下证]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1322.html</link>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>做网站的朋友们大部分都知道很多支付渠道和认证都是需要营业执照的，淘宝上办证也都是这个教程来源 觅知社长提供<code><strong>最全的图文教程</strong></code>，以及<code><strong>超清视频的视频</strong></code>教程，按照教程一步步走肯定是可以下证的，而且后期用不上了注销是可网上进行注销的。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="true"><div class="panel-heading " href="#collapse_11741" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">一、已下证公示：</qc></strong> <strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined"> </qc></strong>                                          <strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">（点我展开查看）</qc></strong> </strong></div><div class="collapse in" id="collapse_11741"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:image {"id":1326,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-62-1024x704.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1326"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_12684" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">二、营业执照可用于：</qc></strong> <strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined"> </qc></strong>                                  <strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">（点我展开查看）</qc></strong>  </strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_12684"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol id="block-9cf17cd7-06a6-4271-8eac-3a2667e56a1c"><li><strong>支付接口：支付宝当面付接口、微信商家支付接口</strong></li><li><strong>快手、抖音，企业认证</strong></li><li><strong>网站企业备案</strong></li><li><strong>申请微信公众号（企业可注册50个）</strong></li><li><strong>等等。。。</strong></li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_14891" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">三、申请需要的资料：</qc></strong>  <strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined"> </qc></strong>                                  <strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">（点我展开查看）</qc></strong> </strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_14891"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li><strong>身份证正反面照片</strong></li><li><strong>可以扫码的手机</strong></li><li><strong>身份证本人的人脸识别(必须要身份证本人的人脸识别)</strong></li><li><strong>手机号</strong></li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/alert -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-alert alert-dismissible fade in"><div class="alert jb-red" data-isclose="" role="alert"><strong>收费原因：</strong><br/><br/>目前网上确实与很多相似的教程，但大多数都是一些图文，申请虽然说是0成本，但是如果卡在一步之后一点办法都没有，因为社长提供一个超清的视频教程给到大家，可根据步骤一步暂停观看，申请，所有都已经在视频教程中详细说明<br/><br/>另外整理素材及说明，我都有备注详细说明，支持一下劳动成果，毕竟是实打实可下证，不忽悠</div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/alert -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_17316" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">四、图文申请教程开始： </qc></strong>                                 <strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">（点我展开查看）</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_17316"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="payshow" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="payshow"]</span><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>1、首先打开【海南政务服务网】</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/buttons -->
<div data-quantity="1" data-radius="true" class="wp-block-zibllblock-buttons radius"><span class="an_1 but b-blue"><strong><a href="https://wssp.hainan.gov.cn/hnwt/home" data-type="URL" data-id="https://wssp.hainan.gov.cn/hnwt/home" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">海南政务网官网</a></strong></span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/buttons -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>2、先在海南政务网注册/登录一个账号之后在</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>首页搜索框搜索个体工商户开业登记并找到<strong>三亚市场监督管理局区域</strong>然后点击右侧<strong>在线办理</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>3、搜索结果如果没有显示三亚就点<strong>查看更多</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1331,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-63-1024x693.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1331"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>4、点击在线办理跳转后点击：设立登记，我没有名称，进行登记（如图）</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1335,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-64-1024x551.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1335"/><figcaption>点击：设立登记 </figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1336,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-65-1024x578.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1336"/><figcaption>点击：我没有名称---开始办理</figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>5、点击之后跳转到下图界面</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>商事主体类型：个体工商户</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>请选择名称要素的排列方式：行政区划+字号+行业+组织形式</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>字号</strong>就是公司名称，2-3个字 <strong>行业选择</strong>：网络科技（主营业务：基础软件开发） 组织形式：工作室 然后点击查重，必须要和下图一样，查重没有重复的，才不会审核</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1340,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-68-1024x510.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1340"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>6、行政区划选择-如下图：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1338,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-67.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1338"/><figcaption> <strong>行政区划选择</strong> </figcaption></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>7、公司名称查重之后，显示没有重复的，点击保存下一步</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>弹出一个窗口，确认无误后点击确定 跳转新窗口：</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1341,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-69.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1341"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>8、填写基本信息</strong>（按图中要求填写即可）</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1342,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-70-1024x673.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1342"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>9、基本信息保存之后跳转到这个电子文档页面</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1343,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-71-1024x713.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1343"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>10、点击提交会弹出一个窗口（确认一下个人信息是否有误）</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1344,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-72.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1344"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1345,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-73.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1345"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>11、选择经营范围（如下图）</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>ps：不要选择橘色的，要人工审核，其他的都可以选择</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1380,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-87-1024x594.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1380"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>12、选好经营范围之后点击保存并下一步</strong>，填写：商事登记联络员</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1346,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-74-1024x517.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1346"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>13、点击新增商事登记联络员如下图，如实填写就行了</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1347,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-75.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1347"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>13、填写好了如下图</strong>-<strong><span class="has-inline-color has-vivid-red-color">确认无误之后点击保存下一步</span></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1377,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-84-1024x565.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1377"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1378,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-85-1024x584.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1378"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>14、保存下一步，不要管</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>15、直接点击保存并下一步（不用管）</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1379,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-86-1024x613.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1379"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>16、直接点击保存（不用管）</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1348,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-76-1024x609.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1348"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>17、点击保存之后出现一个弹窗，点击确认</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image -->
<figure class="wp-block-image"><img src="https://t.miknio.com/wp-content/uploads/f53d68d090f41a2a784675e83379cfc4-2.png?x-oss-process=image%2Fformat,webp" alt="花30冤枉钱买的个体户营业执照在线0成本快速办理下证-常网小站Miknio"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>18、点击保存之后，出现如下图</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1349,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-77.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1349"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>19、提交之后弹出下个页面，电子文档页面拉倒底部</strong> 如下图</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1350,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-78-1024x656.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1350"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>20、底部有个签名，手机扫码签名，点击：立即签名</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1351,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-79-1024x603.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1351"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>21、签名完成之后 如下图</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1352,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-80.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1352"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>22、签名后提交就会有登记成功提示，如图</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1353,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-81.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1353"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>23、在上图点蓝色字体进入核准通知书链接然后签名即可拿到电子证 </strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>返回首页点击企业开办一网通进去后点击立即办理即可看到证书</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1355,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-83-1024x463.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1355"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1354,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-82-1024x133.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1354"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>24、最后一步，点击：电子营业执照，下载下来，证书下载下来是pdf格式</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>然后百度转换成png即可使用</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>25、全网公示要等几天同步就能查到了</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>公示网官网：<a href="http://www.gsxt.gov.cn/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">http://www.gsxt.gov.cn/&nbsp;</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>26、结束</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>

		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
							<wp:postmeta>
		<wp:meta_key><![CDATA[page_links_submit_s]]></wp:meta_key>
		<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[短视频去水印接口系统源码V2.2/自定义API接口/带强大后台/含多种支付通道]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1385.html</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 31 Aug 2021 15:07:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1385</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">系统介绍：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>短视频去水印接口支持全网解析源码，主要是可自定义API随时更换，一次二次解析均可，完全可以对接全网各大站点。后台UI美丽，功能强大~~</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>接口自行搭建准备，源码自带一个接口，也可调用接口，系统自带规则，根据规则添加合适即可，也可自行对接各大影视接口</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1387,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/image-89-1024x479.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1387"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">特色功能：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>1.内置本地解析接口</li><li>2.支持各大网站二次解析</li><li>3.支持自己开放API权限</li><li>4.支持网站用户开通VIP后可申请API权限</li><li>5.强大的模块管理</li><li>6.完整的VIP开发文档</li><li>7.支持支付宝当面付</li><li>8.新增广告位</li><li>9.全站ajax数据提交</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">安装教程：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>源码上传至根目录</li><li>运行环境PHP7.0</li><li>导入数据库文件</li><li>修改数据库配置文件路径 /application/database.php</li><li>后台地址域名+/admin 默认账号admin/123456</li><li>设置伪静态规则，如下</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">location / {
	if (!-e $request_filename){
		rewrite  ^(.*)$  /index.php?s=$1  last;   break;
	}
}</code></pre>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[一招解决GitHub 加速访问，图片无法加载？一劳永逸的解决方法]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1400.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 01 Sep 2021 15:33:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1400</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 data-color="#ef0c7e" class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme" style="--theme-color:#ef0c7e">前言：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>社长的好几台电脑都是无法访问GitHub，哪怕是能偶尔访问，然后就是Github的图片不能查看，社长经常在Github逛逛，图片加载不出来和加载慢，就很头疼，因此找了好多方法都是没办法长久，偶尔发现一个一直在更新的Github项目，特此分享给大家；</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>应用后的效果就是：网页打开快了，Github&nbsp;图片可以正常加载。</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse {"isshow":false} -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="false"><div class="panel-heading collapsed" href="#collapse_14369" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><span class="has-inline-color has-vivid-cyan-blue-color"><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">一、添加HOSTS方法教程</qc></strong></span>                                                      <strong><qc style="color:#fb2121;background:undefined">（点我展开）</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse " id="collapse_14369"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme"><code>1、Windowns添加Hosts方法</code></h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3>1.把下面的<strong>hosts添加代码内容复制：</strong>如下</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group=""># GitHub Host Start

185.199.108.154               github.githubassets.com
140.82.113.22                 central.github.com
185.199.108.133               desktop.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.153               assets-cdn.github.com
185.199.108.133               camo.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               github.map.fastly.net
199.232.69.194                github.global.ssl.fastly.net
140.82.113.3                  gist.github.com
185.199.108.153               github.io
140.82.114.3                  github.com
140.82.112.5                  api.github.com
185.199.108.133               raw.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               user-images.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               favicons.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               avatars5.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               avatars4.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               avatars3.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               avatars2.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               avatars1.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               avatars0.githubusercontent.com
185.199.108.133               avatars.githubusercontent.com
140.82.112.10                 codeload.github.com
52.216.113.115                github-cloud.s3.amazonaws.com
52.216.8.171                  github-com.s3.amazonaws.com
52.217.64.60                  github-production-release-asset-2e65be.s3.amazonaws.com
52.217.72.76                  github-production-user-asset-6210df.s3.amazonaws.com
52.217.138.17                 github-production-repository-file-5c1aeb.s3.amazonaws.com
185.199.108.153               githubstatus.com
64.71.144.202                 github.community
185.199.108.133               media.githubusercontent.com

# Please Star: https://github.com/isevenluo/github-hosts
# Please Star: https://gitee.com/isevenluo/github-hosts
# Update at: 2021年9月1日 下午10:15:42

# GitHub Host End</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li><strong>hosts文件位置：C:/windows/system32/drivers/etc/hosts</strong></li><li>将上面提供的&nbsp;<strong><code>hosts</code>&nbsp;</strong>内复制粘贴容追加到<code><strong>hosts</strong></code>文件底部，</li><li>然后刷新<code><strong>DNS</strong></code>缓存：ipconfig /flushdns</li><li>如下图演示</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1404,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-3.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1404"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme"><code>MacOS添加Hosts方法</code></h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong><code>hosts</code>&nbsp;</strong>文件位置：<strong>&nbsp;<code>/etc/hosts</code></strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><code>macOS</code>&nbsp;修改需要管理员权限，所以需要按照如下方式配置：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>首先，打开（访达）Finder。</li><li>使用组合键<code><strong>Shift+Command+G</strong></code>打开"前往文件夹"，输入框中输入<code><strong>/etc/hosts</strong></code></li><li>然后就会跳转到<code>hosts</code>文件位置。</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:quote -->
<blockquote class="wp-block-quote"><p><strong>注意：如果你使用<code>VS Code</code>，可以直接用<code>VS Code</code>修改和保存，不需要复制文件。</strong></p></blockquote>
<!-- /wp:quote -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>复制<code><strong>hosts</strong></code>文件到桌面上，鼠标右键右击它，选择「打开方式」—「文本编辑」，打开这个<code><strong>hosts</strong></code>文件，把上面的<code><strong>hosts</strong></code>内容复制进来。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>然后用你修改好的<code><strong>hosts</strong></code>文件替换掉：<code><strong>/etc/hosts</strong></code>&nbsp;文件。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>注意：如果弹出密码输入框，你需要输入你当前登录账号对应的密码。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>最后刷新缓存：sudo killall -HUP mDNSResponder</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/collapse -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-collapse"><div class="panel" data-theme="panel" data-isshow="true"><div class="panel-heading " href="#collapse_13989" data-toggle="collapse" aria-controls="collapseExample"><i class="fa fa-plus"></i><strong class="biaoti "><strong><qc style="color:#ef0c7e;background:undefined">二、SwitchHosts软件自动更新版本-推荐</qc></strong></strong></div><div class="collapse in" id="collapse_13989"><div class="panel-body"><!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>此款软件支持&nbsp;<strong><code>Windwos</code>&nbsp;</strong>和&nbsp;<strong><code>macOS</code>&nbsp;</strong>系统，使用方式时一样的。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>软件下载地址</strong>：<a href="https://github.com/oldj/SwitchHosts/releases" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://github.com/oldj/SwitchHosts/releases</a></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:heading {"level":3} -->
<h3><br>设置定时同步云端最新hosts</h3>
<!-- /wp:heading -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>安装好 SwitchHosts 后，打开软件点击左上角+号 新增一条远程规则：</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>Hosts类型：远程</li><li>Hosts标题：github-hosts（自定义即可）</li><li>URL：<a href="https://gitee.com/isevenluo/github-hosts/raw/master/hosts" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://gitee.com/isevenluo/github-hosts/raw/master/hosts</a></li><li>自动刷新：1小时</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1408,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-5.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1408"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1409,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-6.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1409"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1406,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-4.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1406"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>这样你就可以定时获取最新的&nbsp;hosts&nbsp;了，再也不用担心&nbsp;github&nbsp;无法访问，图片加载不了的问题。</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>可以把软件设置为开机自启动，或者根据自身需求，按需打开软件之后软件会自动更新Hosts规则</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph --></div></div></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/collapse -->]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>社长在修改模仿了两款款精美的刷新即更换背景视频的引导页源码，更新了刷新机制，每刷新一次网页更换一个背景视频</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme"><code>优化内容：</code></h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>更新刷新机制</li><li>优化首页代码</li><li>加入F12防盗机制</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">带随机背景视频模板</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1473,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-10-1024x501.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1473"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">带wap端动态背景模板</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1474,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-11-1024x501.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1474"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->]]></content:encoded>

		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">主题介绍</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>Justnews主题定位于博客风格的自媒体新闻类型的主题，在国内的WordPress主题圈子中来说，这款这款主题与知更鸟的begin主题一样非常出名，因为功能强大，目前在官网的售价已经高达499元，对于一款新闻风格类型的主题能够出售到这么高的价格，并且已经出售了将近两千份的主题，可想而知这款主题的功能是何等的强大。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1479,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-12-1024x832.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1479"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">主题特色：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>响应式设计，完美兼容PC端、手机端和平板等各类设备访问</li><li>模块化随心组合，全新可视化编辑器，自由组合模块做出个性页面</li><li>强大SEO功能，代码级优化，免装SEO插件，文章关键词自动内链</li><li>前端用户中心，自主原创开发的前端用户中心功能，可支持社交登录</li><li>可视化设置，后台设置选项均有可视化的设置面板，小白也可快速上手</li><li>手机注册登录，新版本可支持手机注册登录功能，并向下兼容邮箱帐号登录</li><li>文章专题归类，支持文章专题添加，可灵活展示网站特定类型文章</li><li>快讯功能，通过快讯功能可实时发布网站或者行业最新新闻动态</li><li>文章功能扩展，快讯、专题、投稿、版权、打赏、点赞、收藏、手机分享图</li><li>原创Themer框架，为主题提供后台设置面板、可视化工具、基础功能集合</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1480,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-13-1024x654.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1480"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">后台演示</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1481,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-14-1024x527.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1481"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1482,"sizeSlug":"large","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-large"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/98doutc/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/image-15-1024x383.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1482"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">更新日志：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme"><code>版本号：V6.0.1 </code></h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li>优化快讯功能样式；</li><li>优化修复上一版本用户反馈的问题；</li><li>优化与QAPress插件4.0.0版本兼容性；</li><li>Justnews主题 6.0.1破解版主要更新的仍旧是安全方面的更新，不过在ui方面也做了一定的改进，栅格系统从原有的12格升级到最大24格【挺鸡肋的功能】。并且</li><li>从6.0版本后已经不再对IE9以下版本做兼容处理，所以如果您的网站用户很多仍旧使用的是ie浏览器的用户不推荐升级的。</li><li>FontAwesome图标库也从原来旧版本的默认自动加载，优化成了可选择性的加载内容，相对可以一定程度的加快网站运行。</li><li>另外也增加了系统通知这个功能，在用户未访问的内容页，可以在系统后台选择一键通知，其中包含留言通知、投稿通知、用户关注通知等等。</li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->]]></content:encoded>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[bilibili原生超仿弹幕播放器带后台管理去授权破解支持视频解析m3u8,mp4]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1486.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 04 Sep 2021 13:52:09 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1486</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>一款带有后台管理的精仿b站弹幕视频播放器源码，播放器支持官方视频解析（需要设置解析接口），m3u8和mp4（不支持H265），播放器支持添加视频前置广告，暂停广告，原视频跑马灯广告遮盖和视频记忆播放功能。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">功能介绍</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>功能：播放器集群功能，弹幕AV定制、前置广告、暂停广告，记忆回放，自动下一集<br>支持：.m3u8、.mp4、.flv 等常见视频格式，注意：不支持 MP4 H265 格式的视频<br>兼容：电脑、手机端</li><li>画中画 (那么这是什么,我们下面在科普一下)<br>弹幕系统 (看过B站的应该无人不知,因为他叫 B站弹幕网)<br>高防B站的233娘播放器 (这可能是这个播放器卖得火的特色)<br>视频LOGO配置 (LOGO图片在右上角哦~)<br>暂停广告 (可在后台单独配置,这样可以给其他站点吸引到流量)</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">安装教程：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/tabs {"tabHeaders":["安装教程","运行环境"],"layout":"nav-left"} -->
<div class="mb20 post-tab nav-left"><div class="list-inline scroll-x mini-scrollbar tab-nav-theme"><li class="active"><a class="post-tab-toggle" href="javascript:;" tab-id="0">安装教程</a></li><li class=""><a class="post-tab-toggle" href="javascript:;" tab-id="1">运行环境</a></li></div><div class="tab-content"><!-- wp:zibllblock/tab -->
<div class="tab-pane fade active in" tab-id="0"><!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li><strong>最好是Nginx系统</strong></li><li><strong>注释：全部用PHP 7.3或7.3以上版本的PHP 其他不兼容</strong></li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li><strong>解压所有文件，在你网站目录</strong></li><li><strong>宝塔运行目录设置为/run</strong></li><li><strong>创建数据库</strong></li><li><strong>导入数据库</strong></li><li><strong>修改数据库（改成自己的数据库在此文件夹）/core/store/Config.php</strong></li><li><strong>设置伪静态 在解压包里面 自己查看</strong></li><li><strong>修改run/jx/btjson/config 将里面json改成你自己解析后台的json就可以 接口获取地址：https://svip.zny91.com</strong></li><li><strong>默认后台 域名/admin 默认帐号密码 admin 123456 改密码在后台右上角</strong></li><li><strong>修改run/jx/player.php文件</strong></li><li><strong>没有接口可以调用被人的解析接口</strong></li><li><strong>更多教程…..请在压缩包根目录查看</strong></li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list --></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/tab -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/tab {"id":1} -->
<div class="tab-pane fade" tab-id="1"><!-- wp:list {"ordered":true} -->
<ol><li><strong>Mysql ≥ 5.5</strong></li><li><strong>PHP 大于等于 7.3</strong></li><li><strong>Mysql ≥ 5.5</strong></li></ol>
<!-- /wp:list --></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/tab --></div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/tabs -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前台演示</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1525,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->

							</item>
					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[WordPress上传图片自动重命名无需插件]]></title>
		<link>https://www.98dou.cn/1543.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 04 Sep 2021 14:48:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[98douadai]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">https://www.98dou.cn/?p=1543</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">前言：</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:list -->
<ul><li>1、这两天社长在发布文章的时候突然发现好多图片展开放大的时候引用另外一张图片，而且我之前有习惯经常会用到中文名称的图片来上传。这么做的话，在下一次网站搬家的时候就会出现破图问题</li><li>2、刚好找到了一个不错的方法，立马转来先分享给大家了再说。这个功能以后还是会用到的。虽然我博客不用，因为我有不用中文名称图片的好习惯，我都是自己命名的。</li><li>3、同时这个方法也很好的避免之前有同名称图片再上传会覆盖的问题。毕竟图片上传后自动重命名。</li></ul>
<!-- /wp:list -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">方法一【按时间重命名】</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>上传文件时会<code>以年月日时分秒+千位毫秒整数</code>的格式重命名文件，如<code>202109041412432.jpg</code>。如图</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1544,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/mizhibk/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2021090414360240.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1544"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//wordpress上传文件图片按时间重命名重命名
function git_upload_filter($file) {
    $time = date("YmdHis");
    $file['name'] = $time . "" . mt_rand(1, 100) . "." . pathinfo($file['name'], PATHINFO_EXTENSION);
    return $file;
}
add_filter('wp_handle_upload_prefilter', 'git_upload_filter');</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">方法二【用MD5加密生成数字并重命名】</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p>名称规则是由<code><strong>系统自动生成的一个32位的MD5加密文件名</strong></code>，由于默认生成的32位文件名有点长，所以使用<code><strong>substr(md5($name),0,20)</strong></code>截断将其设置为20位。</p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->
<div data-type="reply" class="wp-block-zibllblock-hide-content"><span>[hidecontent type="reply"]</span><!-- wp:zibllblock/enlighter -->
<pre class="wp-block-zibllblock-enlighter"><code class="gl" data-enlighter-language="generic" data-enlighter-theme="" data-enlighter-highlight="" data-enlighter-linenumbers="" data-enlighter-lineoffset="" data-enlighter-title="" data-enlighter-group="">//wordpress上传文件图片MD5加密重命名
function rename_filename($filename) {
    $info = pathinfo($filename);
    $ext = emptyempty($info['extension']) ? '' : '.' . $info['extension'];
    $name = basename($filename, $ext);
    return substr(md5($name), 0, 20) . $ext;
}
add_filter('sanitize_file_name', 'rename_filename', 10);</code></pre>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/enlighter --><span>[/hidecontent]</span></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/hide-content -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->
<h1 class="wp-block-zibllblock-biaoti title-theme">使用操作教程</h1>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/biaoti -->

<!-- wp:paragraph -->
<p><strong>在主题目录下<code>functions.php</code>文件里面最下面，然后下面的代码复制进去即可。</strong></p>
<!-- /wp:paragraph -->

<!-- wp:image {"id":1545,"sizeSlug":"full","linkDestination":"none"} -->
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full"><img src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/1426239465/mizhibk/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/2021090414454464.png" alt="" class="wp-image-1545"/></figure>
<!-- /wp:image -->

<!-- wp:zibllblock/alert -->
<div class="wp-block-zibllblock-alert alert-dismissible fade in"><div class="alert jb-yellow" data-isclose="" role="alert">推荐“代码一”的方式来自动命名，因为这是最简便的一个方式了，名字长度也在可接受范围。同时上述两段代码都避免了上传含有中文字符名称图片带来的数据迁移造成名称乱码的问题，兼容性非常的好。</div></div>
<!-- /wp:zibllblock/alert -->]]></content:encoded>
